title.value: UK Core Early Warning Total Score

description.value: A set of codes for the recording of Early Warning Score systems total scores. Selected from the SNOMED CT UK coding system: - 1104051000000101 | Royal College of Physicians National Early Warning Score 2 total score (observable entity) | - 1363261000000104 | National Paediatric Early Warning Score total score (observable entity) |
